mapper.insert: insert into t_farm_product ( bid,item_type, title,sell_point, price,num,image, status,priority, created_user,created_time, modified_user,modified_time ) values ( #{bid},#{itemType}, #{title},#{sellPoint}, #{price},#{num}, #{image},#{status}, #{priority}, #{createdUser},#{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser},#{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid}

SELECT id,name, province,city, area,zip, phone,district, address,tag, tel, is_default AS isDefault FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY is_default DESC,/*第一排序规则：按默认方式从1-0降序排列*/ modified_time DESC /*第二排序规则：按修改时间降序排列，最新修改的时间排到前面*/
mapper.update: UPDATE t_address SET is_default=0 WHERE uid=#{uid}
UPDATE t_address SET is_default=1, modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select uid,/*第一次设计，用于拿uid进行比对*/ name,province, city,area, district,zip, address,phone, tel,tag, /* 在修改收货地址信息的时候需要添加一些其他的字段*/ /*name,province,city,area,district,zip,address,phone,tel,tag*/ is_default AS isDefault from t_address where id=#{id}
SELECT id FROM t_address WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY modified_time DESC LIMIT 0,1 /*跳过0条取出一条，最终只取出一条数据*/
mapper.update: UPDATE t_address SET name=#{name}, province=#{province},city=#{city}, area=#{area},district=#{district}, zip=#{zip},address=#{address}, phone=#{phone},tel=#{tel}, tag=#{tag},is_default=#{isDefault}, modified_user=#{modifiedUser},modified_time=#{modifiedTime} WHERE id=#{id}
